html:
Schneider Electric SE, a France-based provider of energy and automation digital solutions, has agreed to acquire Acquis Software, Termis Software and Water Loss Management Software businesses from Aveva Group Plc, a UK-based information technology company, for consideration of GBP2.6 million (USD3.66 million). The transaction is expected to close in or around July 2021.

Deal In Brief

Deal Value (US$ Million)3.66
Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-CategoryAsset Purchase
Deal StatusAnnounced: 2021-05-11

Deal Participants

Acquirer (Company)Schneider Electric SE
Vendor (Company)AVEVA Group plc
